title: Planning a water harvesting project
brief_description: Certain aspects of the water harvesting project developed at the Sydney University Farm, Badgery’s Creek. Describes the essential needs on an average farm and shows the construction of storage dams, various irrigation systems available, and the correct application of irrigation to pastures.
